01

About

How do we help
Asset Managers

Take your investment analysis to the next level with US Stock Insights. Our research service provides you with interactive reports on 1300 US Stocks, updated every week. Get actionable insights customized to your investment philosophy with our enhanced factor-analysis framework. Plus, our automated ranking system helps you identify opportunities quickly and efficiently.

Savings in equity
research resources

Our solution helps asset managers achieve better economies of scale and material savings in equity research resources.

Advanced
Technology

Our enhanced factor-analysis framework generates insights for most investment philosophies.

Industry
Expertise

Our team of experts provides you with comprehensive research on 1300 US Stocks, updated every week.

Customer-Centric
Approach

By automating tedious tasks, our solution gives you more time to focus on high-value activities and leverage your soft skills.

securities

Interactive tools and features
covering largest and most liquid market

40+ advanced composites
and models

Get comprehensive insights from our proprietary 40-model research process, covering thousands of data points per company.

stocks, indexes and sectors

and custom measures

Features

Why a Factor Investment Framework?

Factor investing, supported by insights from Nobel Laureates, serves as the foundation for integrating fundamental analysis, technical analysis, and risk management.

Features

Why US companies?

Home to the most impactful companies in the world. The largest equity market. Best Information availability for analysis.

03

Insights

Advanced Investment Research and Analysis

A comprehensive suite of tools and analytics, featuring proprietary 360-degree analysis and intelligent portfolio building, designed to inform and optimize investment decisions.

  • Stock Rankings

  • 360 Degree Analysis

  • Custom Index Analytics

  • Smart Portfolio Builder

Stock Rankings

Comprehensive Stock Rankings and Analysis

Our stock rankings provide a detailed assessment of each stock's performance, including:

  • Performance metrics
  • Risk metrics
  • Flow dynamics
  • Profit sensitivity
  • Earnings stability
  • Factor analysis
  • Sector and industry classification
  • External factor analysis
See demo

360 degree analysis

In-Depth Stock Insights

Our proprietary 360-degree analysis provides a comprehensive view of each stock, including:

  • Fundamental analysis
  • Short-term analysis
  • Flow dynamics
  • Peer analysis
  • GenAI narrative
  • Quality analysis
  • Risk analysis
  • Detailed growth dynamics
  • Main valuation models
See demo

Custom Index Analytics

Advanced Index Analysis and Customization

Our custom market weighted index analytics enable you to:

  • Screen for top-performing indexes
  • Analyze index segments
  • Create and analyze custom indexes
  • Access detailed market weighted analytics and composites
See demo

    Portfolio Construction and Optimization

    • Select top-ranked stocks by investment philosophy
    • Customize industry exposure
    • Automate analysis of each security, sector, and basket
